attributes.action: Make cookie preferences remembered and permanent on web sites.
attributes.background: To make cookie preference choices made by people browsing made permanent and not have to go through the rigmorale of verifying your choices every time you visit a website, even though it is not the first time on a site, it is completely frustrating and annoying.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

How cookies are retained is a matter for individual websites and browsers, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
